flawed_nl_solution:
After 20 new students joined the class at the start of the school year, the number of students increased to 160+20 = <<160+20=810>>810
However, at the end of the year, 1/3*810 = <<1/3*810=270>>270 students had transferred from the school.
The total number of students remaining in the school at the end of the year is 810-270 = <<810-270=540>>540
#### 540

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
